basicInfo.name: Karma
basicInfo.flavor: As the once-benevolent emperor began to change after meeting Bai Jiao, Karma tried to leave the palace. However, fearing that Rin would fall victim to Bai Jiao, he chose to stay.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Magic Attack plus 60% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 3 Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict Damage Reduction [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - 3 Enemies
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 6% Damage Reduction. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Skill 1.name: Infernal Redemption
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 25% of Magic Attack plus 28% of Defense 3 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 28% of Magic Attack plus 33% of Defense.

Skill 2.name: Agonizing Tempest
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 31% of damage dealt.
 - 3 Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 20% of Magic Attack plus 23% of Defense 3 time(s).
 - Consumes 4 stack(s) of [Perseverance] to deal additional Piercing damage equal to 39% of Magic Attack plus 45% of Defense during each attack.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 23% of Magic Attack plus 26% of Defense.
 - Increases Effect: HP Recovery amount becomes 37% of Damage.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Changes Number of Targets: To All Enemies

Passive.name: Fallen Sage
Passive.desc:
Allies (Universal)
 - Grants Damage Boost. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants 1 stack(s) of Perseverance upon being hit by an enemy's attack 1 time(s). [Max 4 Stack(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Damage Resistance. [Ends After: Taking 3 Hit(s)]
 - Grants Damage Resistance upon using any attack 2 time(s). [Ends After: Taking 3 Hit(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Damage Boost to 15%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: 33% Block Rate Boost. [Always Active]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Rin, Lee Jung, Yu Shin, quiet, calm, fishing
profile.dislikes: Pascal, Bai Jiao, Sun Wukong, noisiness, commotion, murder
profile.story: As the once-benevolent emperor began to change after meeting Bai Jiao, Karma tried to leave the palace. However, fearing that Rin would fall victim to Bai Jiao, he chose to stay.

basicInfo.name: Karma
basicInfo.flavor: Haunted by the belief that peace had been bought with unforgivable bloodshed, Karma began to lose himself in despair. Rin's quiet strength pulled him back from the edge. From that moment, he decided he would do whatever it took to protect her.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 45% of Magic Attack plus 55% of Defense 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 55% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Infernal Redemption
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 21% of Magic Attack plus 25% of Defense 3 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 21% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 25% of Magic Attack.

Skill 2.name: Agonizing Tempest
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 24% of damage dealt.
 - 3 Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 18% of Magic Attack plus 20% of Defense 3 time(s).
 - Consumes 4 stack(s) of [Perseverance] to deal additional Piercing damage equal to 35% of Magic Attack plus 40% of Defense during each attack.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 18% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 20% of Magic Attack.

Passive.name: Fallen Sage
Passive.desc:
Allies (Universal)
 - Grants Damage Boost. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants 1 stack(s) of Perseverance upon being hit by an enemy's attack 1 time(s). [Max 4 Stack(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Damage Resistance. [Ends After: Taking 3 Hit(s)]
 - Grants Damage Resistance upon using any attack 2 time(s). [Ends After: Taking 3 Hit(s)]

basicInfo.name: Karma
basicInfo.flavor: During the War of Destruction, Karma gathered a powerful following through sheer force and became known as one of the Four Lords. However, when he realized his actions amounted to nothing more than senseless slaughter, he fell into despair and joined Pascal's ranks.

スキル強化効果

 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Magic Attack.

スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 15% of Physical Attack.
